formattedAddress: 635 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10025, USA
adrFormatAddress: 635 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10025, USA

originalText.text:
Updated Review: I recently celebrated my special day at "The Shell," and it was an amazing experience. The oysters were plump and full of flavor, and the clams were incredibly fresh. While waiting for my appetizers, the warm bread and oil were a delightful treat.

The Squid Ink Linguine with Clams, Mussels, and Calamari stole the show. The pasta was perfectly cooked, and the sauce was rich and delicious. The seafood was tender and paired perfectly with the pasta.

The service was top-notch, and the staff surprised me with a birthday song and a complimentary cake. It made the celebration even more special. I highly recommend "The Shell" for a great seafood dining experience.

Past Review: I had the pleasure of dining at "The Shell", a delightful seafood restaurant that exceeded all my expectations. Having walked past it numerous times, I was already drawn to its inviting ambiance, and today, I finally decided to give it a try. From the moment I stepped inside, I knew I was in for a treat.

As I entered, the hostess warmly greeted me with a friendly smile and promptly escorted me to my seat. The atmosphere was lively yet cozy, with tasteful decor. There is outside dining as well.

Once seated, I was fortunate to have Jorge as my server, who proved to be a true gem. His attentiveness and professionalism were outstanding, and he effortlessly made me feel welcomed and well-cared for throughout my meal. He started by asking my preference for water, and I was pleasantly surprised when he brought out a tall glass bottle, ensuring that I would have plenty to drink.

To begin my culinary adventure, I opted for the happy hour menu, available from 3 to 6 pm from Tuesday to Saturday. With an array of choices, I decided to indulge in the mussels, two orders of oysters, and butterfly shrimp. Each item was priced at a reasonable $12, making it even more appealing.

When the food arrived, I was absolutely delighted. The mussels were perfectly cooked, tender, and bathed in a flavorful broth that made every bite a delight. The oysters were incredibly fresh and served on a bed of ice, accentuating their natural brininess. As for the butterfly shrimp, they were crispy, succulent, and accompanied by a delectable dipping sauce that complemented their delicate flavors perfectly.

Throughout my meal, the service remained amazing. The staff members were friendly, attentive, and knowledgeable about the menu. They were more than happy to answer any questions I had and ensured that I had everything I needed to thoroughly enjoy my dining experience.

Leaving "The Shell", I couldn't help but feel utterly satisfied and grateful for such a remarkable culinary adventure. The combination of fantastic food, attentive service, and charming atmosphere left a lasting impression on me. I am already looking forward to my next visit, and I wholeheartedly recommend "The Shell" to anyone in search of an exceptional seafood dining experience.

originalText.text:
This has become one of our neighborhood staple restaurants! Everything I have ordered has been fantastic! We are particularly fond of the lobster salad and lobster ravioli but their daily specials always impressed and their custom cocktail menu is great!
They are also very accommodating and patient with our young child and he loves their mac and cheese!

text.text:
This has become one of our neighborhood staple restaurants! Everything I have ordered has been fantastic! We are particularly fond of the lobster salad and lobster ravioli but their daily specials always impressed and their custom cocktail menu is great!
They are also very accommodating and patient with our young child and he loves their mac and cheese!

originalText.text: Excellent and highly recommended. The service here is top notch, so friendly, nice, professional and attentive! There is plenty of outdoor and indoor seating at the bar or in the main dining room. The restaurant is spacious and clean. The menu is broad and delicious, along with an impressive happy hour! I enjoy fresh oysters and white wine. I will be back for more. Enjoy this lovely neighborhood place!!

text.text: Excellent and highly recommended. The service here is top notch, so friendly, nice, professional and attentive! There is plenty of outdoor and indoor seating at the bar or in the main dining room. The restaurant is spacious and clean. The menu is broad and delicious, along with an impressive happy hour! I enjoy fresh oysters and white wine. I will be back for more. Enjoy this lovely neighborhood place!!

originalText.text: We had a lovely experience dining at The Shell. The wait staff were super attentive and nice. As an appetizer, we had the octopus which was very tender. They also brought out bread with a tasty oil. For entrees we got the squid ink pasta and paella, both of which tasted very fresh. Our server was super kind and brought us a dessert for free to go along with the Irish coffee and Ruby port we ordered. Overall, we had a wonderful experience at the Shell and the food and service were great.

text.text: We had a lovely experience dining at The Shell. The wait staff were super attentive and nice. As an appetizer, we had the octopus which was very tender. They also brought out bread with a tasty oil. For entrees we got the squid ink pasta and paella, both of which tasted very fresh. Our server was super kind and brought us a dessert for free to go along with the Irish coffee and Ruby port we ordered. Overall, we had a wonderful experience at the Shell and the food and service were great.

originalText.text: I can not stress the amount of deliciousness I have experienced. The oysters are fresh, the shrimp perfectly seasoned and fried. The service Hoque provides is just above and beyond. He just knew what drink I needed.
